// Power BI M Script - Auto Generated
// This script loads CSV files and creates the semantic model

let
    // Load Orders Data
    Orders = Csv.Document(File.Contents("c:\Users\Vengala Bhaskar\Downloads\Python Folder\powerbi_data\Orders_Sample.csv"),
        [Delimiter=",", Columns=21, Encoding=65001, QuoteStyle=QuoteStyle.None]),
    Orders_Header = Table.PromoteHeaders(Orders, [PromoteAllScalars=true]),
    
    // Load People Data
    People = Csv.Document(File.Contents("c:\Users\Vengala Bhaskar\Downloads\Python Folder\powerbi_data\People_Sample.csv"),
        [Delimiter=",", Columns=2, Encoding=65001, QuoteStyle=QuoteStyle.None]),
    People_Header = Table.PromoteHeaders(People, [PromoteAllScalars=true]),
    
    // Load Returns Data
    Returns = Csv.Document(File.Contents("c:\Users\Vengala Bhaskar\Downloads\Python Folder\powerbi_data\Returns_Sample.csv"),
        [Delimiter=",", Columns=2, Encoding=65001, QuoteStyle=QuoteStyle.None]),
    Returns_Header = Table.PromoteHeaders(Returns, [PromoteAllScalars=true])
    
in
    Orders_Header
